title: (x) "Candid Camera" Q magazine font - September {Yves}
content:
EASY,

HOW YA’LL DOING?

Was just wondering if anyone could help me find out what the, secondary I think, Q Magazine font is as attached here..

any help is much appreciated !

hope everyone’s day is rocking along..

Ed

comments.content: THANKS DUDE! that is wicked and so much help..
No problem. I actually didn’t know what it was, but recognised Rian’s signature style, so all it took was a little browsing.
